channel.title: Authors on Global freshwater biodiversity research
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Global freshwater biodiversity research

item.title: People
item.description:
Dr. Sami Domisch is a Junior Research Group Leader and is interested in freshwater biodiversity and developing tools in spatial freshwater biodiversity science.
We will introduce more faces in August ;-) Collaborators Giuseppe Amatulli Walter Jetz Jani Heino Virgilio Hermoso Mathias Kuemmerlen Jens Kiesel Simone Langhans Rita Adrian Sonja Jähnig Peter Haase Daniel Hering Eren Turak
